textContent:
Muddle five pitted cherries. 
Add .5 ounce of Maraschino, 1.5 ounces of vodka (or white rum, if you’d rather), .75 ounce of fresh lemon juice and .25 ounce of simple syrup. 
Shake all that up hard, then double strain into a tall glass with fresh ice. 
Add a splash of soda and stick a cherry on top.Â
title: Cherry on Top
